# Ek Bata Shoonya (एक बटा शून्य)
> Free mathematics education platform in Hindi — from zero to infinity.

Ek Bata Shoonya is an educational initiative that teaches mathematics in Hindi.
It offers video lectures, structured notes, and downloadable PDFs covering
topics in mathematical logic, set theory, and foundational mathematics.

The platform supports multiple language registers:
- Hindi (शुद्ध हिन्दी) — pure Devanagari
- Hindi + English — mixed technical terms
- Hinglish — Hindi in Roman script
- English — full English
